ccg-setinfo.name: Call to Arms
ccg-setinfo.game: Star Trek Collectible Card Game: Second Edition

card.name: A Bad End
card.text: Randomly select one of your stopped personnel on this planet to be killed.

card.name: An Old Debt
card.text: Unless you have Biology, Physics, and Cunning>32 or Intelligence and 2 Medical, randomly select a Leadership personnel to be killed.

card.name: Close Call
card.text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Security or 2 Programming and Transporters, randomly select an Engineer to be killed.

card.name: Confined to Quarters
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Leadership, all three are stopped.

card.name: Dangerous Climb
card.text: Unless you have 2 Geology or Strength>40, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Depression
card.text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 2 Medical or Telepathy and Integrity>32, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped and this dilemma is returned to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: DNA Analysis
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Medical or a personnel who has 2 Science, your opponent chooses a Medical or Science personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Don't Let It End This Way
card.text: Randomly select one of your stopped personnel on this ship to be killed.

card.name: Dressing Down
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. If the cost of any of those personnel is 1, all three are stopped.

card.name: Failure To Communicate
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Security, your opponent chooses a Anthropology or Security personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Forsaken
card.text: Unless you have 2 Honor or 2 Treachery, all your personnel are stopped. Each Honor or Treachery personnel that uses his or her skills while facing this dilemma is placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

card.name: Gomtuu Shock Wave
card.text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Integrity>32 or Telepathy and Integrity>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes-2.

card.name: Graviton Wave
card.text: Unless you have Astrometrics, Physics, and Cunning>32 or Biology and 2 Medical, randomly select a Science personnel to be killed.

card.name: History Repeats Itself
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Anthropology, all three are stopped.

card.name: Inside Collaborators
card.text: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Diplomacy or a personnel who has 2 Treachery, your opponent chooses a Diplomacy or Treachery personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Justice or Vengeance
card.text: Unless you have Anthropology and 2 Security or Exobiology, Honor, and Integrity>32, randomly select a Treachery personnel to be killed.

card.name: Miner Disagreement
card.text: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Cunning>32 or 2 Exobiology and Leadership, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Murder Investigation
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Security, all three are stopped.

card.name: Overwhelmed
card.text: Place this dilemma on this mission. When a personnel facing a dilemma at this mission uses his or her skills, he or she is stopped. At the end of this turn, return this dilemma to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Psychic Receptacle
card.text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel who has that skill. While a personnel who has that same card title is facing a dilemma, he or she cannot use his or her skills. This effect lasts until the end of this mission attempt.

card.name: Psycho-Kinetic Attack
card.text: Unless you have Exobiology and 2 Medical or Honor and Telepathy, randomly select a Security personnel to be killed.

card.name: Quantum Filament
card.text: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics and 2 Navigation or 2 Engineer, Science, and Shields>8, this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - When your personnel aboard this ship are about to face a dilemma, randomly select one of them to be stopped.

card.name: Restricted Area
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, that personnel is placed in your opponent's brig instead, then randomly select a second personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

card.name: 'Rock People'
card.text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Integrity>30 or Exobiology, Medical, and Cunning>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

card.name: Rogue Borg Ambush
card.text: Unless you have Intelligence and Cunning>35 or a Hand Weapon and Strength>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

card.name: Secret Identity
card.text: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your deck. Place the personnel your opponent chose in his or her owner's discard pile. Shuffle and replace your deck.

card.name: Sheer Lunacy
card.text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Cunning>32 or 2 Programming and Science, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Skeleton Crew
card.text: Place this dilemma on this mission. To begin a mission attempt at this mission, you must have at least six personnel involved. When you complete this mission, this dilemma is overcome.

card.name: So Many Enemies
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Treachery, all three are stopped.

card.name: Sokath His Eyes Uncovered!
card.text: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy or Cunning>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: The Demands of Duty
card.text: Your opponent chooses a personnel. Unless you choose to have all your personnel be stopped, that personnel is killed.

card.name: Jem'Hadar Disruptor Pistol
card.text: Hand Weapon. While in combat, each of your {dom} personnel present is Strength +1.

card.name: A Second Chance at Life
card.text: Q. Reveal your hand. Choose an opponent to choose a card from your hand. Discard it to take any other non-interrupt card from your discard pile into hand. Destroy this event.

card.name: Abduction
card.text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop your two {bor} Security personnel present together at a non-Headquarters mission to name a skill. Randomly select an opponent's personnel present who has that skill and take command of him or her.

card.name: Adding to Our Perfection
card.text: Assault. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your {bor} personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel and take command of him or her.

card.name: Borg Cutting Beam
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your {bor} ship. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved, take command of that personnel, place him or her on that {bor} ship, then place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

card.name: Bred for Battle
card.text: Assault. Plays in your core. Order - Discard two cards from hand to begin combat involving your Jem'Hadar. Your non-Jem'Hadar present are not involved in the combat. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Building a Bridge
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {dom} personnel. Plays in your core. When you complete a mission, for each Vorta that used any of his or her skills to complete that mission, each opponent discards a card from hand and you may draw a card.

card.name: Cavalry Raid
card.text: Plays in your core. When an engagement in which an opponent's personnel was killed ends, you may destroy this event to unstop each of your {kli} personnel and {kli} ships involved and restore all Range those ships have used this turn. You cannont begin any other engagements this turn.

card.name: Changeling Sabotage
card.text: Infiltration. Plays in your core. Order - If your Infiltrator in aboard an opponent's undamaged ship, return that Infiltrator to his or her owner's hand to place a Damage card from hand aboard that ship.

card.name: Dispensing the White
card.text: To play this event, you must command a Treachery Vorta. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: Dissolving the Senate
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {rom} personnel. Plays in your core. When your personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy this event to make one of your unique personnel present attributes +4. This effect last until the end of that mission attempt.

card.name: Enemy in Your Midst
card.text: Infiltration. Morph. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to place any number of your Infiltrators at one mission aboard a ship at the same mission.

card.name: I Don't Like to Lose
card.text: Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may discard a card from hand to subtract up to three dilemmas from the number of dilemmas you may draw and add that same number to the total cost you may spend on dilemmas.

card.name: Jem'Hadar Ambush
card.text: Assault. Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your {dom} personnel. If you win, score 10 points.

card.name: Jem'Hadar Birthing Chamber
card.text: Plays in your core. When you place a Jem'Hadar in your discard pile, you may discard a non-personnel card from hand to place a non-unique Jem'Hadar from hand at your Headquarters where he could be played.

card.name: Jem'Hadar Strike Force
card.text: Assault. Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your {dom} personnel. If you win, score 10 points and randomly kill and opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: One With the Borg
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {bor} personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to score 5 points for each personnel you command but do not own.

card.name: Psychological Pressure
card.text: Punishment. Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is facing a dilemma, if he or she has the same skills as any of your captives, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that skill.

card.name: Quite a Coincidence
card.text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. When an opponent's personnel who has that card title is killed, destroy this event to score 10 points.

card.name: Regeneration Alcoves
card.text: Plays in your core. When you are about to play a {bor} personnel at your Unicomplex, you may discard the top card of your deck to play that personnel on your {bor} ship instead.

card.name: Sabotage Program
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {DS9} personnel. Plays in your core. When an event is played, you must destroy this event to prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile.

card.name: Sensing a Trap
card.text: To play this event, you must command a {rom} Intelligence personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, name a card. When an opponent plays that card, score 10 points. This effect lasts until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Set Up
card.text: Infiltration. Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is about to be randomly selected, if your Infiltrator is at that mission, you may destroy this event to instead choose the opponent's personnel to be selected from all eligible possibilities.

card.name: Severed Link
card.text: To play this event, you must command a {bor} Programming personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

card.name: Sluggo
card.text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. That personnel cannont use his or her skills to meet mission requirements.

card.name: Steeled By Loss
card.text: Replace a {baj} personnel you command with a {baj} personnel in your discard pile that has at least one of the same skills. Place the personnel you replaced in his or her owner's discard pile. Remove this event from the game.

card.name: Stir Crazy
card.text: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, if he or she has already completed a mission of the same type, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

card.name: The Blight
card.text: To play this event, you must command two Founders. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event. Starting with the player to your left, each player may choose an event to be destroyed.

card.name: The Crystalline Entity
card.text: Plays in your core. Order - If you command another event, give command of this event to the player on your right to destroy an event (move this event to his or her core).

card.name: The Enterprise Incident
card.text: Capture. Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your {rom} ship. Each of your ships at the same mission that has your {rom} Intelligence personnel aboard it may join the engagement. If you win, randomly select an opponent's Leadership personnel involved to place in your brig.

card.name: The Manheim Effect
card.text: Temporal. Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may destroy this event to take an overcome dilemma you own from an opponent's completed mission and place it on top of your dilemma pile.

card.name: The Trial Never Ended
card.text: Q. Plays in your core. When a dilemma is about to be overcome, you may destroy this event to exchange that dilemma with the top card of its owner's dilemma pile. (The new dilemma is overcome.)

card.name: The Will of the Collective
card.text: Assault. Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your {bor} personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved, take command of that personnel, and place him or her on your {bor} ship at this mission.

card.name: Trial of Faith
card.text: Prophet. To play this event, you must command three {baj} personnel. Plays in your core. An opponent may play a card he or she owns that is on this event as if that card were in his or her hand. If he or she does, score 5 points. Order - Examine an opponent's discard pile. Place one of those cards on this event. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Under Suspicion
card.text: Infiltration. Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, for each of your Infiltrators at that mission, you may draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

card.name: Vorta Cloning
card.text: Plays in your core. When you are about to place a Vorta in your discard pile, you may reveal a card from hand and remove it from the game to take that Vorta into hand instead.

card.name: We're Mutants
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {fed} personnel. Plays in your core. While your Genetically Enhanced personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy this event to make him or her gain one of every skill he or she already has until the end of this turn.

card.name: Adapt
card.text: When your {bor} personnel is facing a dilemma, if a copy of that dilemma is overcome at a mission you command, prevent and overcome that dilemma.

card.name: Analyze
card.text: When an opponent’s dilemma that your {bor} personnel is facing is about to be returned to its owner’s dilemma pile, overcome that dilemma instead.

card.name: Cultist Attack
card.text: Pah-wraith. To play this interrupt, you must command a {baj} Treachery personnel. Order - Each player removes all interrupts in his or her discard pile from the game.

card.name: Founder Trap
card.text: Infiltration. When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, discard a random card from hand to add the skills of your Infiltrator at that mission to the mission’s requirements. This effect lasts until the end of that opponent’s turn. Remove this interrupt from the game.

card.name: Insult
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command three {rom} personnel. Order - Choose an opponent to discard the top card of his or her deck. If it is not a personnel, discard the top two cards of your deck. If it is a personnel who costs 1, you may place this interrupt on top of your deck insted of discarding it.

card.name: Our Death is Glory To the Founders
card.text: When an event or interrupt is played, kill one of your Jem’Hadar to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Parting Shot
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. When an opponent’s personnel uses his or her skills, if he or she is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to kill that personnel.

card.name: Pseudopod
card.text: Infiltration. Morph. Order - Return your Infiltrator to his or her owner's hand to randomly kill an opponent's personnel present with that Infiltrator.

card.name: Security Sweep
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command two {rom} Security personnel. Order - Reveal the top three cards of an opponent’s deck. If they are all personnel, score 10 points. Place them in the same order on the bottom of that opponent’s deck.

card.name: The Founder is Wise
card.text: When your Vorta is facing a dilemma, he or she is attributes +2 and gains all skills on one of your Founders present. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: We're Everywhere
card.text: Morph. When your Shape-shifter is killed, download a Shape-shifter.

card.name: You Could Be Invaluable
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command two {fed}{Maq} personnel. Order - Reveal the top four cards of your deck and take a non-{Maq} personnel revealed into hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Archanis Dispute
card.text: Leadership, Cunning>30, and (Diplomacy and Law or Intelligence and Treachery)

card.name: Assault on Species 8472
card.text: 2 Engineer, Exobiology, Physics, and Cunning>34

card.name: Battle Reconnaissance
card.text: Exobiology, Programming, Security, Transporters, and Strength>32

card.name: Camping Trip
card.text: Biology, Geology, Science, Cunning>34, and (Acquisition or Honor) You may attempt and complete this mission using your {dom} personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>34.

card.name: Clash at Chin'toka
card.text: Engineer, Leadership, Navigation, Officer, and Cunning>36

card.name: Destroy Iconian Gateway
card.text: Engineer, Leadership, Physics, Security, and Strength>34

card.name: Destroy Transwarp Hub
card.text: 2 Engineer, Exobiology, Navigation, Physics, Programming, Security, and Cunning>48 Nebula. You may attempt and complete this mission for 35 points using your {bor} personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Programming, 2 Security, and Cunning>34.

card.name: Evade Borg Vessel
card.text: Astrometrics, Leadership, Navigation, Officer, and Cunning>36 Nebula. You may attempt and complete this mission using your {bor} personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Security, and Cunning>34.

card.name: Evade Dominion Squadron
card.text: Astrometrics, Geology, 2 Navigation, and Cunning>34 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {dom} personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Leadership, 2 Navigation, and Cunning>34.

card.name: Expose Changeling Influence
card.text: Anthropology, Engineer, Honor, 2 Security, and Integrity>36 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {dom} personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>40.

card.name: Extract Defector
card.text: Intelligence, 2 Navigation, and (Security and Strength>34 or Transporters and Cunning>32) You may attempt and complete this mission using your {car} or {dom} personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, Leadership, Programming, Security, and Cunning>34.

card.name: Founders' Homeworld (Home of the Great Link)
card.text: You may play {dom} cards, {na} cards, and equipment at this mission. Nebula. Region: Omarion Nebula.

card.name: Harness Omega Particle
card.text: Engineer, Geology, Medical, 2 Physics, Programming, Science, and Cunning>48 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {fed} personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Medical, Officer, Physics, Science, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>48.

card.name: Hunt Alien
card.text: 2 Exobiology, Navigation, Strength>32, and (Leadership or Security)

card.name: Instruct Advanced Drone
card.text: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Honor, Medical, Programming, and Integrity>35 Nebula. You may attempt and complete this mission using your {bor} personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Engineer, Programming, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>40.

card.name: Mouth of the Wormhole (Terok Nor)
card.text: You may play {TN} cards, {na} cards, and equipment at this mission. Region: Bajor System.

card.name: Pacify Warring Factions
card.text: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Leadership, and Integrity>33 When your personnel attempting this mission is killed by a dilemma, you may return that personnel to his or her owner’s hand instead.

card.name: Peaceful Contact
card.text: Diplomacy, Honor, Leadership, Navigation, and Integrity>31 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {dom} personnel with these requirments: Intelligence, Leadership, Security, Transporters, and Strength>34.

card.name: Plot Invasion
card.text: Transporters, Cunning>30, and (Leadership and Officer or 2 Security) You may attempt and complete this mission using your {fed} personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, Leadership, Security, and Strength>30.

card.name: Political Intrigue
card.text: Engineer, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>34 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {fed} or {kli} personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, 2 Intelligence, Security, and Cunning>34.

card.name: Rescue Prisoners of War
card.text: Intelligence, Navigation, Programming, Transporters, and Cunning>32 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {dom} personnel with these requirements: Exobiology, Leadership, Security, Treachery, and Strength>32.

card.name: Restock Ketracel-White
card.text: Biology, 2 Leadership, Transporters, and Integrity>29 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {fed} or {kli} personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Intelligence, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>36.

card.name: Salvage Borg Ship
card.text: Astrometrics, Engineer, Medical, Programming, and Cunning>34

card.name: Salvage Dominion Ship
card.text: Diplomacy, Engineer, Leadership, Programming, and Strength>34 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {dom} personnel with these requirements: 2 Diplomacy, Honor, Medical, and Cunning>34.

card.name: Signal for Rescue
card.text: Biology, Engineer, Programming, Security, Strength>42, and (Diplomacy and Treachery or Honor and Leadership)

card.name: Stage Bombardment
card.text: 2 Leadership, Navigation, Officer, and Cunning>34 Nebula. Region: Omarion Nebula. You may attempt and complete this mission using your {dom} personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, 2 Leadership, Treachery, and Cunning>32.

card.name: Study Rare Phenomenon
card.text: Engineer, Navigation, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {dom} personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Leadership, Programming, Security, and Strength>34.

card.name: Survey Star System
card.text: Astrometrics, Navigation, Science, and Cunning>34 When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have Acquisition, Diplomacy, or Treachery, score 5 points.

card.name: The Siege of AR-558
card.text: Engineer, Leadership, Physics, Programming, Security, and Strength>38 You may attempt and complete this mission using your {fer} personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Honor, Security, and Strength>42.

card.name: Unicomplex (Root of the Hive Mind)
card.text: You may play {bor} cards and equipment at this mission. You may not command another Headquarters mission.

card.name: Jorem
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Geology {SD}Honor {SD}Security When you play this personnel, for each Assault event you command, he is cost-1.

card.name: Kira Nerys (Reformed Collaborator)
card.text: {SD}Officer {SD}Security {SD}Treachery Dissident. When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. While a Cardassian or Vedek is in your discard pile, this personnel is attributes+1, loses Treachery, and gains Honor and Physics.

card.name: Odo (Wayward Link)
card.text: {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Programming {SD}Security Dissident. Shape-shifter. When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When your Bajoran present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop him or her and this personnel to prevent that.

card.name: Porta (Advisor to the Emissary)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Archaeology {SD}Biology Vedek. When this personnel is facing a dilemma, he may gain a skill from an Anthropology Bajoran in your discard pile until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Tahna Los (Voice of the Kohn-Ma)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Navigation {SD}Physics {SD}Treachery Bajoran Resistance. This personnel is Integrity-1 and Strength+1 for each non-Bajoran present (limit-3/+3).

card.name: Yassim (Zealous Protester)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}2 Honor {SD}Leadership {SD}Medical Vedek. When your {baj} personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may kill this personnel to prevent that.

card.name: Yelsar
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Medical {SD}Navigation {SD}Transporters You may play this personnel at Mouth of the Wormhole.

card.name: Acclimation Drone
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Engineer {SD}Exobiology {SD}Medical Drone. When you play this personnel, for each personnel you command but do not own, this personnel is cost-1.

card.name: Allocation Drone
card.text: {SD}Science Drone. Interlink: Geology.

card.name: Appraisal Drone
card.text: {SD}Science Drone. Interlink: Archaeology.

card.name: Archival Drone
card.text: {SD}Science Drone. Interlink: Anthropology.

card.name: Borg Queen (Bringer of Order)
card.text: {SD}3 Leadership {SD}Treachery Order - Discard the top card of your deck to name a skill. Each of your Borg gains that skill. This effect lasts until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Borg Queen (Guardian of the Hive)
card.text: {SD}3 Leadership {SD}Treachery While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may replace your Drone present with a Drone from your discard pile. Place the Drone you replaced in his or her owner's discard pile. You may do this only once each dilemma.

card.name: Calibration Drone
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Biology {SD}Geology Drone. Order - Place this personnel in his owner's discard pile to count the number of cards in your hand, shuffle them, place them on the bottom of your deck, and draw and equal number of cards.

card.name: Cartography Drone
card.text: {SD}Engineer Drone. Interlink: Astrometrics.

card.name: Computation Drone
card.text: {SD}Navigation {SD}Programming Drone. Each of your other Borg present is Cunning+1.

card.name: Continuity Drone
card.text: {SD}Science Drone. Interlink: Programming.

card.name: Evaluation Drone
card.text: {SD}Security Drone. Interlink: Exobiology.

card.name: Guidance Drone
card.text: {SD}Engineer Drone. Interlink: Navigation.

card.name: Information Drone
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Science {SD}Transporters Drone. Interlink: a skill on your non-{bor} personnel present..

card.name: Invasive Drone
card.text: {SD}Programming {SD}Security {SD}Transporters Drone. Order - Return this personnel to his owner's hand to place any number of your personnel at this mission aboard a ship at the same mission.

card.name: Locutus (Voice of the Borg)
card.text: {SD}2 Diplomacy {SD}2 Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}2 Treachery Commander: Locutus' Borg Cube. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if he uses his Diplomacy, Leadership, Officer, or Treachery to meet its requirements, score 10 points.

card.name: Negation Drone
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Security Drone. Order - Kill this personnel and your other Drone present to destroy an opponent's event.

card.name: Opposition Drone
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Security Drone. Each of your other Borg present is Strength+1.

card.name: Preservation Drone
card.text: {SD}Medical Drone. Interlink: Biology.

card.name: Reclamation Drone
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Medical Drone. When your Borg present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop your other Drone present to place that Borg on top of his or her owner's deck instead.

card.name: Research Drone
card.text: {SD}Medical Drone. Interlink: Physics.

card.name: Seven of Nine (Part of the Greater Whole)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Programming {SD}Science Drone. Order - Place your Drone present on the bottom of his or her owner's deck to draw a number of cards equal to that Drone's cost.

card.name: Seven of Nine (Representative of the Hive)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Exobiology {SD}Physics {SD}Programming {SD}Science Drone. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, she is Strength+2 and gains Security.

card.name: Transwarp Drone
card.text: Drone. Order - If this personnel is aboard a ship, return him to his owner's hand to make that ship Range+2 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Damar (Useful Adjutant)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Officer {SD}Physics {SD}Security {SD}Treachery Glinn. While this personnel is attempting a mission and an opponent is about to draw dilemmas, you may discard a card from hand to subtract one from the number he or she can draw. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Davin
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Law {SD}Treachery When you play this personnel, discard the top card of an opponent's deck.

card.name: Dukat (Liberator and Protector)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}2 Treachery Gul. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, each of your opponents discards the top three cards of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Elim Garak (Plain, Simple Tailor)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Intelligence {SD}Programming {SD}Treachery When this personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may discard a personnel from hand to take this personnel into your hand instead.

card.name: Magren
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Medical {SD}Physics

card.name: Mavek (Science Officer)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Geology {SD}Navigation {SD}Science When you play this personnel, if your non-Cardassian is at this mission, you may download an equipment.

card.name: Nerot
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Exobiology {SD}Security {SD}Transporters Glinn. When you play this personnel, for each Punishment event you command, he is cost-1.

card.name: Thorel
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Geology {SD}Science

card.name: Tora Ziyal (Beloved Daughter)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Geology {SD}Honor Dissident. When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.

card.name: Bashir Founder (Nefarious Saboteur)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Exobiology {SD}Intelligence {SD}Medical {SD}Physics {SD}2 Treachery Founder. Infiltrator. Shape-shifter. When you play an Infiltration card, if this personnel is present with an opponent's personnel, you may draw a card.

card.name: Borath (Psychological Researcher)
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Intelligence {SD}Medical {SD}Programming {SD}Treachery Order - Examine a random card from an opponent's hand. If it is a personnel, draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Founder Councilor
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Science Founder. Shape-shifter. Order - Replace this personnel with a Founder from hand, then place this personnel in her owner's discard pile.

card.name: Founder Leader (Beguiling Teacher)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Exobiology {SD}2 Leadership {SD}Science {SD}Treachery Founder. Shape-shifter. When you play this personnel, each of your other {TN} personnel is Cunning+1 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Founder Leader (Forbidding Judge)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Medical Founder. Shape-shifter. When you play this personnel, you may download a Changeling.

card.name: Ikat'ika (Honorable Warrior)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Biology {SD}Honor {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may make him attributes+2. If you do this, he is killed at the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Imat'Korex
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Honor {SD}Programming {SD}Security

card.name: Keevan (Conniving Liar)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Exobiology {SD}Geology {SD}2 Treachery When you play a Jem'Hadar at this mission, you may choose to have each player draw a card.

card.name: Kilana (Dissembling Envoy)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Medical {SD}Transporters {SD}Treachery Order - Examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of your Changelings present. Replace those cards in any order. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Kira Founder (Examiner)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Geology {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Programming {SD}Treachery Founder. Infiltrator. Shape-shifter. Order - If this personnel is present with an opponent's personnel, discard a card from hand to take an Infiltration event from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Limara'Son (Fierce Soldier)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Navigation {SD}Security {SD}Transporters Order - Begin combat involving this personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved. Place this personnel in his owner's discard pile after combat.

card.name: Lovok Founder (Puppet Master)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Intelligence {SD}Officer {SD}Science {SD}Transporters {SD}2 Treachery Founder. Infiltrator. Shape-shifter. When you play an Infiltration card, if this personnel is present with an opponent's personnel, that opponent discards a random card from hand.

card.name: Martok Founder (Poison of the Empire)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Intelligence {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}2 Treachery Founder. Infiltrator. Shape-shifter. When you play an Assault or Maneuver card, you may discard a card from hand to download an Infiltration card.

card.name: Noret'ikar
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Transporters

card.name: Odera'Klen
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Security

card.name: Rak'tazan
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Officer

card.name: Remata'Klan (Unit Leader)
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Honor {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Security When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may exclude another {dom} personnel present from that selection.

card.name: Tholun
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Law {SD}Medical {SD}Programming {SD}Treachery

card.name: Tozara'Kesh
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Exobiology {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer

card.name: Varen'agor
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Physics

card.name: Weyoun (Instrument of the Founders)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Exobiology {SD}Intelligence {SD}Leadership {SD}2 Treachery While this personnel is present with a Founder, he is attributes+2 and gains Security.

card.name: Weyoun (Loyal Subject of the Dominion)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Security {SD}Treachery When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may draw a card.

card.name: Yak'Talon (Deadly Patroller)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Security When an opponent begins a mission attempt, if this personnel is at that mission, you may kill this personnel to make each personnel attempting the mission attributes-1 until the end of that mission attempt.

card.name: Yelgrun (Blunt Negotiator)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Archaeology {SD}Biology {SD}Diplomacy Order - Kill your non-Changeling present to make each player shuffle his or her hand and exchange it for an equal number of cards from the bottom of his or her deck.

card.name: B'Elanna Torres (Creative Engineer)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}2 Programming When an opponent is about to discard a card from hand, you may place a card from your hand on top of your deck to randomly select that opponent's card from all eligible cards.

card.name: Jack (Maladjusted Misfit)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Physics {SD}Programming Genetically Enhanced. Order - Stop this personnel to name a card type, then reveal a random card from an opponent's hand. If it is that type, place it on top of its owner's deck.

card.name: Lauren (Seductress)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Biology {SD}Geology Genetically Enhanced. Order - Stop this personnel to reveal the top card of an opponent's dilemma pile. If that dilemma could have been faced at your completed mission, you may place it face up beneath that mission (it is overcome).

card.name: Michael Eddington (Traitor to Starfleet)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Programming {SD}Security {SD}Treachery Order - Return this peronnel to his owner's hand to return an opponent's Leadership personnel present to his or her owner's hand.

card.name: Norah Satie (Starfleet Investigator)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Archaeology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Intelligence {SD}Law {SD}Officer Admiral. For each mission you have completed, this personnel is attributes+1.

card.name: Patrick (Idiot Savant)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Engineer {SD}Programming Genetically Enhanced. Order - Stop this personnel to name a card type (except ship), then reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is that type, place it on the bottom of that opponent's deck.

card.name: Reginald Barclay (Reclusive Engineer)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Programming Order - If this personnel is aboard a ship, discard two cards from hand to make it Range+2 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Sarina Douglas (Cataleptic Conundrum)
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Physics {SD}Programming {SD}Science Genetically Enhanced. Order - Stop this personnel to place the bottom card of your deck on top of your deck.

card.name: Quark (Resistance Informant)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Programming Dissident. When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When this personnel is facing a dilemma, he may gain a skill from your Dissident present until the end of that dilemma. You may do this once each turn.

card.name: Rom (Undercover Spy)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Honor {SD}Physics Dissident. Thief. Waiter. When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. While this personnel is present with your Dissident, he gains Astrometrics, Enginner, and Programming.

card.name: Alexander Rozhenko (Good Luck Charm)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Honor {SD}Officer {SD}Transporters When you win an engagement involving this personnel, you may draw a card.

card.name: Darok (Martok's Aide)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Exobiology {SD}Programming When you play this personnel, you may draw a card for each of your {kli} Leadership personnel present (limit three).

card.name: Kor (Noble Warrior to the End)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Honor {SD}Leadership Commander: I.K.S. Ning'tao. While this personnel is in an engagement, you may kill him to make the ship he is aboard attributes +3 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Larg (Piece of Baktag)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Officer {SD}Science {SD}Treachery While this personnel is attempting a mission, he is attributes +1 for each Assault and Maneuver event you command (limit +3).

card.name: Martok (Leader of Destiny)
card.text: {SD}2 Honor {SD}2 Leadership {SD}Officer Chancellor. Commander: I.K.S. Rotarran. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if you command an Assault or Maneuver event, each of your Honor Klingons present is attributes +1.

card.name: E'Tyshra
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Engineer {SD}Intelligence {SD}Leadership {SD}Treachery

card.name: Jakin
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer

card.name: E'Tyshra
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Engineer {SD}Intelligence {SD}Leadership {SD}Treachery

card.name: Kasidy Yates (Maquis Smuggler)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Transporters Commander: Xhosa. Smuggler. Order - Discard a card from hand to take Smuggling Run from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Nydrom
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Biology {SD}Honor {SD}Medical {SD}Physics

card.name: Sharat
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Programming {SD}Treachery

card.name: Karina (Intelligence Analyst)
card.text: {SD}Intelligence {SD}Physics {SD}Science {SD}Transporters {SD}Treachery When your Romulan present is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to have this personnel gain Diplomacy and Security until the end of this mission attempt.

card.name: Mullen
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Navigation {SD}Programming {SD}Security When you play this personnel, for each Maneuver event you command, he is cost-1.

card.name: Pardek (Betrayer)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Treachery Senator. Order - If this personnel is present with an opponent's personnel, return this personnel to his owner's hand to reveal the top four cards of that opponent's deck. You may place a personnel revealed in his or her owner's discard pile. Replace the remaining cards in the same order.

card.name: Ruwon (Intelligence Analyst)
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Intelligence {SD}Leadership {SD}Security {SD}Treachery When your Romulan present is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make this personnel Cunning +2 until the end of this mission attempt.

card.name: Locutus' Borg Cube
card.text: Order - If this ship is staffed, return your Drone aboard it to his or her owner's hand to download a Maneuver card. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Modern Galor
card.text: When you play this ship, discard a card from hand. If you command a {dom} personnel, you may then draw a card.

card.name: Tenak'talar (Weyoun's Warship)
card.text: When an opponent's mission attempt fails, if this ship is staffed and at that mission, score 10 points.

card.name: U.S.S. Defiant (Stolen Warship)
card.text: Cloaking Device. Order - If this ship is staffed and at a non-headquarters mission, this mission's owner places two cards from hand on top of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: I. K. S. Pagh
card.text: Cloaking Device. While this ship is on Engage Cloak, each opponent's ship is Range -1.

card.name: Xhosa
card.text: When this ship is about to move between a Region: Badlands mission and a non-Region: Badlands mission, subtract 1 from the Range required.

card.name: Soterus
card.text: Cloaking Device. While this ship is in an engagement, you may discard a Maneuver card from hand to make it attributes +2 until the end of that engagement.
